Class YahtzeePlayer

java.lang.Object
yahtzee.YahtzeePlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class YahtzeePlayer extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a player in the Yahtzee game.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • YahtzeePlayer

      public YahtzeePlayer(String name)
      Constructs a YahtzeePlayer with the specified name. Initializes the player's scorecard and dice.
      Parameters:
      name - - The name of the player.

  • Method Details

    • rollAll

      public void rollAll()
      Rolls all unheld dice for the player.

    • getDieValues

      public int[] getDieValues()
      Retrieves the current values of all dice for the player.
      Returns:
      An array of integers representing the die values.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the player.
      Returns:
      The name of the player.

    • getScorecard

      public YahtzeeScorecard getScorecard()
      Retrieves the scorecard of the player.
      Returns:
      The YahtzeeScorecard of the player.

    • getDice

      public YahtzeeDie[] getDice()
      Retrieves the array of dice for the player.
      Returns:
      An array of YahtzeeDie representing the player's dice.
